server group

updated: 2018-10-17 03:32
Contents
  • server group
    • server group create
    • server group delete
    • server group list
    • server group show

server group¶

Server group provides a mechanism to group servers according to certain policy.

Compute v2

server group create¶

Create a new server group

openstack server group create
    --policy <policy>
    <name>
--policy <policy>¶

Add a policy to <name> (‘affinity’ or ‘anti-affinity’, default to ‘affinity’)

<name>

New server group name

server group delete¶

Delete existing server group(s)

openstack server group delete
    <server-group> [<server-group> ...]
<server-group>

Server group(s) to delete (name or ID) (repeat to delete multiple server groups)

server group list¶

List all server groups

openstack server group list
    [--all-projects]
    [--long]
--all-projects¶

Display information from all projects (admin only)

--long¶

List additional fields in output

server group show¶

Display server group details

openstack server group show
    <server-group>
<server-group>

Server group to display (name or ID)

updated: 2018-10-17 03:32
